en-US.title: Cribnosh Driver
en-US.subtitle: Delivery driver app for Cribnosh
en-US.description: Cribnosh Driver is the delivery app for drivers to accept orders, navigate to pickup and delivery locations, and manage deliveries. Join the Cribnosh delivery network and earn money delivering meals to customers.

en-US.title: Cribnosh Driver
en-US.fullDescription: Cribnosh Driver is the delivery app for drivers to accept orders, navigate to pickup and delivery locations, and manage deliveries. Join the Cribnosh delivery network and earn money delivering meals to customers.
